bibl.title: Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts

bibl.note: The DPK [Deutsches Papyruskartell]. - The Lots from Oxyrhynchus. - Lot 6 (1910). - Lot B44 (1907). - Lot B34 (1904).
MARTIN Alain, Papyruskartell: The Papyri and the Movement of Antiquities.
A.K. BOWMAN, R.A. COLES, N. GONIS, D. OBBINK, P.J. PARSONS (Edd.), Oxyrhynchus. A City and Its Texts = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 93 (London, 2007) pp. 40-49, 4 tabl.
